Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite

Class DynamicSpriteEntity

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite.SpriteEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite.DynamicSpriteEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, ContinuousRotatable, EventInitiator, GameNode, BufferedMoveable, DirectionProvider, MotionModifier, Moveable, Rotatable, SpeedProvider, Placeable, Removeable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.media.ResourceConsumer, DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator
public abstract class DynamicSpriteEntity
extends SpriteEntity
implements UpdateDelegator, BufferedMoveable, ContinuousRotatable
A DynamicSpriteEntity extends all behaviour of a SpriteEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • DynamicSpriteEntity

      public DynamicSpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D initialLocation, Size size)
      Create a new DynamicSpriteEntity for the given image resource on the given Coordinate2D, with the given Size.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      initialLocation - the initial Coordinate2D of this Entity
      size - The Size (width and height) with which the image should be shown. This Size will also be used as the BoundingBox in case of collision detection

    • DynamicSpriteEntity

      public DynamicSpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D initialLocation, Size size, int frames)
      Create a new DynamicSpriteEntity for the given image resource on the given Coordinate2D, with the given Size.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      initialLocation - the initial Coordinate2D of this Entity
      size - the Size (width and height) that should be used. The height and width divided by the number of frames will be used for displaying the Image and as the BoundingBox in case of collision detection.
      frames - the number of frames the Image contains. By default the first frame is loaded

    • addToEntityCollection

      public void addToEntityCollection​(EntityCollection collection)
      Description copied from class: YaegerEntity
      Add this YaegerEntity to the EntityCollection, which will make it part of the YaegerGame. Since an EntityCollection contains different lists of Entities, a YaegerEntity itself is responsible for knowing to which list it should be added. Note that this method is for internal use only and should not be used when creating a YaegerGame
      Overrides:
      addToEntityCollection in class YaegerEntity
      Parameters:
      collection - the EntityCollection to which this YaegerEntity should add itself

    • getBuffer

    • setRotationSpeed

      public void setRotationSpeed​(double rotationAngle)
      Description copied from interface: ContinuousRotatable
      Set the angle at which this YaegerEntity will bew rotated at each update. Note that a positive rotation value rotates the YaegerEntity counter clockwise, and a negative value rotates the YaegerEntity clockwise.
      Specified by:
      setRotationSpeed in interface ContinuousRotatable
      Parameters:
      rotationAngle - the angle as a double
